languages.text: Grants {uip|tHPNumber|5da89253c7ea493d92a955f101a53349} temporary wounds. All failed Dodge and Parry attempts are re-rolled once. Also negates the next damage instance.

languages.text: Персонаж получает {uip|tHPNumber|5da89253c7ea493d92a955f101a53349} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g} и возможность однократно повторять попытки {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирования{/g} в случае провала. Также он игнорирует следующий случай получения урона.

languages.text: キャラクタが{uip|tHPNumber|5da89253c7ea493d92a955f101a53349}{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な傷{/g}を得る。次のダメージを無視し、失敗した{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}をリロールする。
languages.original_text: The character gains {uip|tHPNumber|5da89253c7ea493d92a955f101a53349} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. They re-roll failed {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} attempts once and ignore the next instance of damage.

traits.locale_text: キャラクタが{uip|tHPNumber|5da89253c7ea493d92a955f101a53349}{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な傷{/g}を得る。次のダメージを無視し、失敗した{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}をリロールする。

languages.text: Le personnage gagne {uip|tHPNumber|5da89253c7ea493d92a955f101a53349} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures{/g} temporaires. Il relance une fois les tentatives d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Esquive{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parade{/g} ratées et ignore la prochaine instance de dégâts.
languages.original_text: The character gains {uip|tHPNumber|5da89253c7ea493d92a955f101a53349} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. They re-roll failed {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} attempts once and ignore the next instance of damage.

traits.locale_text: Le personnage gagne {uip|tHPNumber|5da89253c7ea493d92a955f101a53349} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures{/g} temporaires. Il relance une fois les tentatives d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Esquive{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parade{/g} ratées et ignore la prochaine instance de dégâts.

languages.text: El personaje gana {uip|tHPNumber|5da89253c7ea493d92a955f101a53349} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}. Repite los intentos fallidos de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} una vez e ignora la siguiente vez que reciba daño.
languages.original_text: The character gains {uip|tHPNumber|5da89253c7ea493d92a955f101a53349} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. They re-roll failed {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} attempts once and ignore the next instance of damage.

traits.locale_text: El personaje gana {uip|tHPNumber|5da89253c7ea493d92a955f101a53349} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}. Repite los intentos fallidos de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} una vez e ignora la siguiente vez que reciba daño.

languages.text: 此角色获得{uip|tHPNumber|5da89253c7ea493d92a955f101a53349}点{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}失败时可以重骰一次，且无视下一次承受的伤害。
languages.original_text: The character gains {uip|tHPNumber|5da89253c7ea493d92a955f101a53349} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. They re-roll failed {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} attempts once and ignore the next instance of damage.

traits.locale_text: 此角色获得{uip|tHPNumber|5da89253c7ea493d92a955f101a53349}点{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}失败时可以重骰一次，且无视下一次承受的伤害。

languages.text: Der Charakter erhält {uip|tHPNumber|5da89253c7ea493d92a955f101a53349} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}. Er wiederholt fehlgeschlagene {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}- und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}-Versuche einmal und ignoriert die nächste Schadensinstanz.
languages.original_text: The character gains {uip|tHPNumber|5da89253c7ea493d92a955f101a53349} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. They re-roll failed {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} attempts once and ignore the next instance of damage.

traits.locale_text: Der Charakter erhält {uip|tHPNumber|5da89253c7ea493d92a955f101a53349} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}. Er wiederholt fehlgeschlagene {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}- und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}-Versuche einmal und ignoriert die nächste Schadensinstanz.

languages.text: Karakter, {uip|tHPNumber|5da89253c7ea493d92a955f101a53349} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır. Başarısız {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} teşebbüslerinde bir kez daha teste girer ve bir sonraki hasar silsilesini yok sayar.

traits.locale_text: Karakter, {uip|tHPNumber|5da89253c7ea493d92a955f101a53349} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır. Başarısız {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} teşebbüslerinde bir kez daha teste girer ve bir sonraki hasar silsilesini yok sayar.
